xwikidoc.title: About
xwikidoc.content:
You'll find the latests sports scores on this Wiki. This Wiki has been created to work with the [[Mycroft Sports Skill>>url:https://github.com/ldubost/sports-skill]] by extracting sports scores from the great Wikipedia.
This would not be possible without the amazing Wikipedia community who is updating Wikipedia pages very quickly as games are finished. Kudos to Wikipedia.
=== Source & Licence ===
The initial source of the data from this Wiki is from Wikipedia pages. All the content on this Wiki is licenced under the ODBL.
You can find the [[source code>>url:https://github.com/ldubost/xwiki-sports-skill]] of this service on GitHub
=== Contact ===
If you would like to contact me about this service or about the MyCroft skill, you can find me on [[Mastodon (@ldubost@framapiaf.org)>>url:https://framapiaf.org/@ldubost]] or on [[Twitter (ldubost)>>url:https://twitter.com/ldubost]]
